byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Brit plane damages German bomber off Suffolk coast; German planes driven off from Shetland and Orkney Islands
snippet: Brit plane damages German bomber off Suffolk coast; German planes driven off from Shetland and Orkney Islands...

headline.main: NAZI BOMBER LOSES IN FIGHT OFF BRITAIN; R.A.F. Pilot Surprises German Who Dives 15,000 Feet
